A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I would rather watch \"The Room\" or \"Disaster Movie\" than this horrible film for a 2nd time. The main plot is boring\, the side plot is a complete waste of time\, the characters are either been wasted (Finn/ Luke/ Leia/ Poe/ Phasma(again!) /Snoke ) or unbearable (Rey/ Kylo/ Rose/ DJ) . Their motivations are either unreasonable or not existing at all. Asking yourself why this or that character is doing what he/she does the answer is - the plot demands it. I know R.J. had nothing to work with but to see how many \"Gotcha\" moments he could fit into one single movie was not a good call. the film was an abomination. The good thing is though - I've learned to apprechiate the Prequels more. Even Episode II.
